summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Nineteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1259 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
